# decorator signature mismatch should be diagnosed

! go build .
stderr 'decorator type mismatch'

-- go.mod --
module example.com/decorators_mismatch

go 1.23

-- main.go --
package main

// D_mismatch is a decorator with wrong S shape for the decorated function.
func D_mismatch(x func(int) int) func(int) int { return x }

@D_mismatch
func B(s string) string { return s }
